title: Mother in law video taped woman giving birth without her permission
text:
“I asked her to delete the video - and she promised she had.”

A woman in the US has live streamed an update on her sister's labour.

It’s somewhat ironic that *Beth went into labour on Halloween four years ago.

As the experience turned into quite the surreal nightmare.

“Holy damn those days of labour were hell! I honestly didn't think it could get any worse. I. Was. Wrong.”

Not only did it take the poor first-time mum four days to give birth – but her mother-in-law made her an even more torturous time.

“When we got to the hospital I was already 8cm and was rushed in and rushed to get hooked to the medical devices, my MIL came in two hours later,” she explained.

“Everything seemed fine and calm until MIL wanted a cigarette and started to demand I start to push, then she tried to threaten that if I didn't start pushing, she will have to push down on my stomach to force my daughter out.”

There's a time and a place - and this wasn't one of them! Source: iStock

"I was in the middle of pushing when she ran in"

Thankfully, the nurses heard this hideous remark and made her take a walk. So she left for 40 minutes.

However, getting some fresh air didn’t knock any sense into the shameless woman.

“I went into labour and I was in the middle of pushing when she ran in, this being my first child and being in labour for so long with no pain meds or rest or food/water I was drained. Pushing was hard as hell and I just wanted to sleep!” she vividly remembers.

But her MIL put a stop to any form of relaxation.

“Well the moment my daughter was born was the moment I noticed that the entire labour MIL had her phone out and was recording my ENTIRE birth! From my pushing too the stitching process (I tore 100 per cent),” she said.

“I asked my MIL to delete the video, and she promised she did.”

A week later, visiting the MIL revealed all...

It seems her MIL has no problems with not only breaking her promises but also lying to her daughter-in-law’s face.

“It wasn't until a week later when we went to visit her (she had an ‘emergency’) that I found she was showing random strangers this video and many of these strangers were men that she barely knew.”

Unfortunately, it wasn’t just a case of Beth insisting (once again) that her MIL delete the private footage.

Instead, it turned into a dirty legal battle.

“It took going to court to get the video deleted and after that she wasn't allowed near me nor my daughter.”

And shockingly, there is a sequel to the MIL birth drama on the way…

“This isn't the only thing she's done. There's a whole other labour story of when I had my son and how bad she messed up.”

*Name changed
description: “I asked her to delete the video - and she promised she had.”
